Chaos: Ch4
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: Chaos: Ch4
By Waddafxup 101 on Monday, July 16, 2007 - 03:21 pm:

"Come on!" Wolfeye said dashing through the Marketplace."We'll miss the boat!"

"Calm down."Noble told Wolfeye.

"Well hurry up then!"

"Quiet you two"Chris said.

"HmmHmm"Judo snickered.

Suddenly a woman's shriek came from the other side of town.

"Aaaggh!" Judo screamed "What was that?!"

"It sounded like a call for help!" Noble answered.

"It's not our problem."

Before Judo could say anymore Noble was dsprinting down alleys heading towards the scream.

"Noble!" Judo said chasing after him.

Alleyway after alleyway they went trying to get some answers for the scream.It was almost an hour before they saw a Basilisk(Zuum/Joker)with a handful of money darting through the narrow halls.

"Get out of my way now!"He ordered.

Noble in reaction pulled out his sword,delivering a deep gash in the Zuum's left leg.

"Gaaaghhh!" he howled in pain,falling to the streets.

The zuum still injured, managed to pull himself
up.He then charged at Noble.Noble once again slashed the Zuum slightly on the side of his neck.

"Grraaagh!"He screeched.

He then turned around,but this time advancing towards Judo.Judo quickly plunged out of his path as Noble moved into his way.

Noble and the skull of the Zuum clash as bothe of them pushing with all their might.The Basilisk the grows tired and flllas to the ground for the last time.

Not only a few minutes later do the guards show up and drag him away.They meet the elderly lady that eveyone heard only a little more than two hours ago.
"Thank you."She says handing us a locket.

"It wiil open when life is threatened.I am old and life has been very prosperous.I will not need it."

"Thank you" Noble says.

Judo then remembers,"The ship!"

They then race to the port where the ship sleeps.
When they arrive the ship is sailing out of the dock.judo being the younger of the two and hurdles onto the ship.

"Come on!" Judo yells to Noble."You can make it!"

Noble stands there as the ship Floats out of site.


* * *


"What to do?" Noble asks himself.

He than notices a pefectly good ship a sign that reads FOR SALE.

"Hmmmmm"Noble says."Let's see how much money I have". . .
